title: "How can perfect self-control enhance your personal influence and magnetism?"
first_phrase: This text discusses how to exercise influence over someone through one's own psycho-physical balance, with the ultimate goal of achieving perfect self-control. The text warns that if one does not dominate their emotions, they will experience a loss of magnetism, weakening their influence. The text emphasizes the importance of remaining calm and avoiding emotional outbursts to maintain one's influence. The last 200 tokens further discuss how disappointment, irritation or being enervated can lead to certain physical and vocal expressions, which we must avoid at all costs.
content: One reaches the eventual point at which he has mastery over his own self, and he is capable of retaining an imperturbable serenity even in the most awfully pathetic circumstances, by beginning to subjugate, through the help of a small effort, the emotionalism which everyday impulses generate. An enormous consumption of strength escorts the fulfilment of emotional impulses. Do not argue therefore in an animated manner. Do not debate. Listen calmly when something is being communicated to you, and do not express your opinion unless you cannot possibly do without it. Do not allow yourself to be compelled into speaking against your will. It is by beginning to dominate a slight motion of impatience that one ultimately soars to the degree at which he can keep his impassive cool even in the face of serious provocations. Feeling disappointed, irritated or enervated occasions certain physiognomic expressions, gestures and vocal outbursts, which we must ban from our selves at every cost.
last_phrase: In order to attain a state of imperturbable serenity, it is essential to subjugate the emotionalism that aggressors to everyday impulses. By dominating slight motions of impatience, one can preserve a calm demeanor even in serious provocations. To achieve this, try the strategy of inhaling and exhaling slowly for eight seconds while mentally concentrating on absorbing the force of your desires. Practice this tactic several times, and you will ultimately master the magnetic force that leads to balance and fulfillment.
